verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David בְּשַׁנּוֹת֣וֹ <S%H8138><s%> when he changed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> טַ֭עְמוֹ <S%H2940><s%> his behaviour לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> Abimelech וַֽ֝יְגָרֲשֵׁ֗הוּ <S%H1644><s%> who drove him away וַיֵּלַֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> along אֲבָרֲכָ֣ה <S%H1288><s%> I will bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵ֑ת <S%H6256><s%> at all times תָּ֝מִ֗יד <S%H8548><s%> [shall] continually תְּֽהִלָּת֥וֹ <S%H8416><s%> his praise בְּפִֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> [be] in my mouth

בַּ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD תִּתְהַלֵּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> shall make her boast נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> My soul יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> shall hear עֲנָוִ֣ים <S%H6035><s%> the humble וְיִשְׂמָֽחוּ׃ <S%H8055><s%> [thereof] and be glad

גַּדְּל֣וּ <S%H1431><s%> O magnify לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִתִּ֑י <S%H854><s%> for וּנְרוֹמְמָ֖ה <S%H7311><s%> with me and let us exalt שְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

דָּרַ֣שְׁתִּי <S%H1875><s%> I sought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְעָנָ֑נִי <S%H6030><s%> and he heard וּמִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְ֝גוּרוֹתַ֗י <S%H4035><s%> me from all my fears הִצִּילָֽנִי׃ <S%H5337><s%> me and delivered

הִבִּ֣יטוּ <S%H5027><s%> They looked אֵלָ֣יו <S%H413><s%> to him וְנָהָ֑רוּ <S%H5102><s%> unto him and were lightened וּ֝פְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6440><s%> and their faces אַל־ <S%H408><s%> will never יֶחְפָּֽרוּ׃ <S%H2659><s%> were not ashamed

זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> This עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> This poor man קָ֭רָא <S%H7121><s%> cried וַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD שָׁמֵ֑עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard וּמִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all צָ֝רוֹתָ֗יו <S%H6869><s%> him out of all his troubles הוֹשִׁיעֽוֹ׃ <S%H3467><s%> [him] and saved

חֹנֶ֤ה <S%H2583><s%> encampeth מַלְאַךְ־ <S%H4397><s%> The angel יְהוָ֓ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD סָ֘בִ֤יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לִֽירֵאָ֗יו <S%H3373><s%> them that fear וַֽיְחַלְּצֵֽם׃ <S%H2502><s%> him and delivereth

טַעֲמ֣וּ <S%H2938><s%> O taste וּ֭רְאוּ <S%H7200><s%> and see כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] good יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י <S%H835><s%> blessed הַ֝גֶּ֗בֶר <S%H1397><s%> [is] the man יֶחֱסֶה־ <S%H2620><s%> [that] trusteth בּֽוֹ׃

יְר֣אוּ <S%H3372><s%> O fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD קְדֹשָׁ֑יו <S%H6918><s%> ye his saints כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there מַ֝חְס֗וֹר <S%H4270><s%> for [there is] no want לִירֵאָֽיו׃ <S%H3373><s%> to them that fear

כְּ֭פִירִים <S%H3715><s%> The young lions רָשׁ֣וּ <S%H7326><s%> do lack וְרָעֵ֑בוּ <S%H7456><s%> and suffer hunger וְדֹרְשֵׁ֥י <S%H1875><s%> but they that seek יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not be in יַחְסְר֥וּ <S%H2637><s%> shall not want כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of any טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> any good

לְֽכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> Come בָ֭נִים <S%H1121><s%> ye children שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> hearken לִ֑י יִֽרְאַ֥ת <S%H3374><s%> you the fear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲלַמֶּדְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3925><s%> unto me I will teach

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who הָ֭אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> What man הֶחָפֵ֣ץ <S%H2655><s%> [is he that] desireth חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> life אֹהֵ֥ב <S%H157><s%> [and] loveth יָ֝מִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> [many] days לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> that he may see טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> good

נְצֹ֣ר <S%H5341><s%> Keep לְשׁוֹנְךָ֣ <S%H3956><s%> thy tongue מֵרָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> from evil וּ֝שְׂפָתֶ֗יךָ <S%H8193><s%> and thy lips מִדַּבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> from speaking מִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> guile

ס֣וּר <S%H5493><s%> Depart מֵ֭רָע <S%H7451><s%> from evil וַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and do ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good בַּקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> seek שָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace וְרָדְפֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7291><s%> and pursue

עֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> The eyes יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> are toward צַדִּיקִ֑ים <S%H6662><s%> [are] upon the righteous וְ֝אָזְנָ֗יו <S%H241><s%> and his ears אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> are toward שַׁוְעָתָֽם׃ <S%H7775><s%> [are open] unto their cry

פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> The face יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּעֹ֣שֵׂי <S%H6213><s%> [is] against them that do רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> evil לְהַכְרִ֖ית <S%H3772><s%> to cut off מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of them from the earth זִכְרָֽם׃ <S%H2143><s%> the remembrance

צָעֲק֣וּ <S%H6817><s%> [The righteous] cry וַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD שָׁמֵ֑עַ <S%H8085><s%> heareth וּמִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all צָ֝רוֹתָ֗ם <S%H6869><s%> them out of all their troubles הִצִּילָֽם׃ <S%H5337><s%> and delivereth

קָר֣וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] nigh יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לְנִשְׁבְּרֵי־ <S%H7665><s%> unto them that are of a broken לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> heart וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּכְּאֵי־ <S%H1793><s%> such as be of a contrite ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> and saveth

רַ֭בּוֹת <S%H7227><s%> Many רָע֣וֹת <S%H7451><s%> [are] the afflictions צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous וּ֝מִכֻּלָּ֗ם <S%H3605><s%> all יַצִּילֶ֥נּוּ <S%H5337><s%> delivereth יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD

שֹׁמֵ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> He keepeth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַצְמוֹתָ֑יו <S%H6106><s%> all his bones אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> not one מֵ֝הֵ֗נָּה <S%H2007><s%> of them לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נִשְׁבָּֽרָה׃ <S%H7665><s%> is broken

תְּמוֹתֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> shall slay רָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> Evil וְשֹׂנְאֵ֖י <S%H8130><s%> and they that hate צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous יֶאְשָֽׁמוּ׃ <S%H816><s%> shall be desolate

פּוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> redeemeth יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the soul עֲבָדָ֑יו <S%H5650><s%> of his servants וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יֶ֝אְשְׁמ֗וּ <S%H816><s%> in him shall be desolate כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> who הַחֹסִ֥ים <S%H2620><s%> and none of them that trust בּֽוֹ׃
